home.presentacion: I'm a Web Front/Back End Developer, specialized in the area of Web and Mobile application development. Student of ING. en Gestión y Desarrollo de Software.

about.info:
I am 23 years old and I am in my TENTH semester of ING. en DESARROLLO Y GESTIÓN DE SOFTWARE. I develop web and mobile applications.
I have developed personal projects, in most of them, I am in charge of the design part, the client side (Front-End) and the application logic or server side (Back-End).

proyect.detalleApp1: A Tu Orden MX is an app of digital menus, the restaurant registers and generates your digital menu and QR code
proyect.detalleApp2: Chesflix is an Web App of user managment encargado de organizar el pago de cada cliente, el cliente vencido se le notifica por WhatsApp.
